output.sentences: We are learning about impressionism in our photography class.
Impressionist painters like Monet would paint the same scene at different times of day.
This gave them the opportunity to see how the light affected the colors and feelings of a time and place.
Lucky for me I can also get different view points in a short amount of time by using a camera and not an easel with paint.
This scene truly does look and feel very different from different angles and with different lighting.
